# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the appearance.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: NSAppearance.Name { get }
```

## Discussion

For a list of standard appearance names, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAppearance/Name-swift.struct].

## Getting the Appearance Name

- **NSAppearance.Name**
